levels.description:
Drone <@ba.vup>+{attack@cnt}</>, Attack Range <@ba.vup>expands</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, releases Drones to lock and attack random enemies; when Drones attack, they have a <@ba.vup>{attack@prob:0%}</> chance to inflict <$ba.fear>Fear</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@fear}</>s
<@ba.rem>When the Drone's locked-on target is defeated, they will search for a new one; when the skill ends, they return to the Operator</>
